tos_checkbox_value: <grey>I declare that I have read and accept the <brand>terms of use.</brand></gray>
pp_checkbox_value: <grey>I declare that I have read and accept the <brand>privacy policy.</brand></gray>
toolkit_text: Bitkit hands you the keys to your money, profile, contacts, and web accounts.
slide1_text: Pay anyone, anywhere, any time, and spend your Bitcoin on the things you value in life.
slide2_text: Send Bitcoin faster than ever. Enjoy instant transactions with friends, family, and merchants.
slide3_text: Hold the keys to portable profiles, dynamic contacts, distributed feeds, and passwordless accounts.
passphrase_text: You can add a secret passphrase to the 12-word recovery phrase. If you do, make sure you don’t forget.
restore_phrase: Please type in your recovery phrase from any (paper) backup.
restore_red_explain: If a word is shown in <red>red</red>, it means that it was not found in the recovery phrase dictionary. Check for spelling errors.
restore_inv_checksum: The checksum for the recovery phrase appears to be incorrect. Please double check your recovery phrase.
restore_passphrase_meaning: *Optional, enter only if you’ve set up one.
restore_error_no_backup: Error: Unable to proceed without a backup
restore_success_text: You have successfully restored your wallet from backup. Enjoy Bitkit!
restore_failed_text: Failed to recover backed up data.
restore_no_backup_warn: If you previously had a lightning backup it will be overwritten and lost. This could result in a loss of funds.
empty_wallet:
To get started send
<brand>Bitcoin</brand> to your wallet.
